title: Why am I always last to be put into the champion select?
body: I am always getting a black screen and I am always last to be put into the champion select, even though I have amazing internet service and nothing else in the game lags ever.

replies.body: Black screen are generally caused by connection issues reaching our game server, regardless of how amazing your internet could be.  My suspicions are further confirmed if it's taking a bit of time for you to transition from pvp.net and into champion select.  Start off by going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot, then test it in a custom game.  Let me know how it goes!
